org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.fxg.logging

Class AbstractLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.fxg.logging.AbstractLogger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IFXGLogger
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SystemLogger

    public abstract class AbstractLogger
extends Object
implements IFXGLogger
    An abstract IFXGLogger implementation to redirect the various utility logging methods to the core log() API: 
     void log(int level, Object message, Throwable t, String location, int line, int column);
